snippet.title: Monstermind Campaign Mode Now Live!
snippet.description:
http://apps.facebook.com/monstermind/?ref=ytm_0002 - Play Monstermind!

In this new addition to the already successful Monstermind, players must tackle brain-busting puzzles, in the form of new boss cities, with increasingly complex tactics and strategic thinking.

Those brave enough to try the Campaign will compete against friends for coveted leaderboard spots based on how intelligently and quickly they take our boss cities down. 

Over 50 cities, in five separate boss campaign states, await you.
Play to prove your worth!

Join the discussion: http://www.facebook.com/MonstermindGame/?app_data=ytm_0002
